items.title: All Terrain
items.description: All-terrain tires offer drivers traction on- and off-road, and are typically used by light truck and SUV drivers who want a tire that's able to climb rocks and perform on the highway.

items.title: Mud Terrain
items.description: Mud Terrain tires offer drivers traction on off-road terrains such as mud, dirt, sand, gravel, and rock, and are commonly used on CUVs, SUVs, light trucks, and jeeps.

items.title: Winter
items.description: For snow, ice, and freezing temperatures

content.body:
### Shop 305/60R18 Tire Size 
The 305/60R18 tire size is a light truck tire that’s a common fit on 1500- and 2500-series light trucks, especially when you’re looking for some extra ground clearance. If your truck is equipped with four-wheel drive, you’re probably in the market for an all-terrain or mud terrain tire that offers great traction off the pavement with an aggressive tread pattern and a reinforced casing that can hold up under rough off-road use.

Looking for a set of 305/60R18 tires that performs on- and off-road? Consider the Toyo Open Country A/T III, [Nitto Ridge Grappler](https://simpletire.com/brands/nitto-tires/ridge-grappler), and Amp Terrain Attack A/T A as each tire offers excellent traction and durability on- and off-road.

You might need something more aggressive than an all-terrain tire if you spend a lot of time off-road. Fortunately, mud terrains tires are specifically designed for heavy off-road driving, and tires like the BFGoodrich Mud-Terrain T/A KM3, Mickey Thompson Baja Boss M/T, and [Kenda Klever MT KR29](https://simpletire.com/brands/kenda-tires/klever-mt-kr29) provide the kind of durability and performance you need in mud, dirt, and other tough off-road terrains.

Whether you need an all-terrain, mud terrain, or another type of tire, SimpleTire has a set of 305/60R18 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
